column1: Iran put forth their best effort against the USA
column2: but the Americans had the upper hand in quality and deserved the victory. They were particularly dominant in the first half
column3: scoring their only goal in the 38th minute through Pulisic. Iran improved in the second half
column4: with Rezaeian displaying a lot of skill on the right side
column5: but they were unable to get a shot past Turner.
